long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Solid Motivation is a browser extension available for both Chrome and Firefox. It transforms your new tab page into a real-time counter displaying your age — in years, down to many decimal places. Every fraction of a second counts, emphasizing the urgency of time and inspiring you to live every moment to the fullest. This extension is powered by Solid.JS and is deeply influenced by maccman's Motivation extension.
